sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The triall of truth wherein are discouered three greate enemies vnto mankinde, as pride, priuate grudge, and priuate gaine, ... Knight, Edward.
[4], 83, [1] leaves
At the three Cranes in the vintree, by Thomas Dawson, and Thomas Butter, Imprinted at London : 1580.
"To the Christian reader" signed: Edw. Knight. With a final colophon leaf. Imperfect; title page spotted with ink, affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
